segment.source: Customizing Spinlock Parameters
segment.target: Customizing Spinlock Parameters

segment.source: Customizing Spinlock Parameters
segment.target: Customizing Spinlock Parameters

segment.source: Customizing Spinlock Parameters
segment.target: Customizing Spinlock Parameters

segment.source: By default, the system logs one spinlock event for every 1000 non-contended acquisitions, and one spinlock event for every contended acquisition.
segment.target: By default, the system logs one spinlock event for every 1000 non-contended acquisitions, and one spinlock event for every contended acquisition.

segment.source: Spinlock data collection supports three parameters that enable you to customize data collection.
segment.target: Spinlock data collection supports three parameters that enable you to customize data collection.

segment.source: To set spinlock collection parameters, use the following command.
segment.target: To set spinlock collection parameters, use the following command.

segment.source: Parameters
segment.target: Parameters

segment.source: spinthreshold
segment.target: spinthreshold

segment.source: The spinlock instrumentation provides a capability to trace heavily contended locks.
segment.target: The spinlock instrumentation provides a capability to trace heavily contended locks.

segment.source: This is achieved by setting a high spin threshold.
segment.target: This is achieved by setting a high spin threshold.

segment.source: If a lock spins less than this threshold, no spinlock event will be logged.
segment.target: If a lock spins less than this threshold, no spinlock event will be logged.

segment.source: For example, if this value is 1, one spinlock event is acquired for each attempt to acquire a lock.
segment.target: For example, if this value is 1, one spinlock event is acquired for each attempt to acquire a lock.

segment.source: If this value is 10, one spinlock event is logged for each ten attempts to acquire a lock.
segment.target: If this value is 10, one spinlock event is logged for each ten attempts to acquire a lock.

segment.source: The default value is 1.
segment.target: The default value is 1.

segment.source: acquiresamplerate
segment.target: acquiresamplerate

segment.source: Sample rate at which spinlock events are logged during a trace.
segment.target: Sample rate at which spinlock events are logged during a trace.

segment.source: For example, if this value is 1000, one spinlock event is logged for each 1000 non-collision event acquisitions.
segment.target: For example, if this value is 1000, one spinlock event is logged for each 1000 non-collision event acquisitions.

segment.source: The default value is 1000.
segment.target: The default value is 1000.

segment.source: contentionsamplerate
segment.target: contentionsamplerate

segment.source: Rate at which spinlock events are logged when collisions occur.
segment.target: Rate at which spinlock events are logged when collisions occur.

segment.source: For example, if this value is 100, one spinlock event is logged for each 100 spinlock collisions.
segment.target: For example, if this value is 100, one spinlock event is logged for each 100 spinlock collisions.

segment.source: The default value is 1.
segment.target: The default value is 1.

segment.source: Remarks
segment.target: Remarks

segment.source: Spinlock collection parameters return to the default values when the system reboots.
segment.target: Spinlock collection parameters return to the default values when the system reboots.

segment.source: To ensure valid data collection, always query or set spinlock parameters before starting event data collection.
segment.target: To ensure valid data collection, always query or set spinlock parameters before starting event data collection.

segment.source: Example
segment.target: Example

segment.source: The following example shows how to query for the current values.
segment.target: The following example shows how to query for the current values.

segment.source: The following example sets the spin threshold to 1, the acquire sample rate to 1000, and the spinlock contention sample rate to 100.
segment.target: The following example sets the spin threshold to 1, the acquire sample rate to 1000, and the spinlock contention sample rate to 100.

segment.source: This query returns the following result for the values set in the previous example.
segment.target: This query returns the following result for the values set in the previous example.
